Articles.Content:
This is my first craft file so it may or may not be that good:D

(If you are gonna fly in IVA view then fly in the back cockpit).

Nose shot:

http://www./download/25p31ze17df31ym/Getting+Started+with+MediaFire.pdf <--Download!

Arse shot:

This as of now is a McDonnell Douglas F-4 phantom II, it is easy to fly (with SAS). It is arse heavy so it might stall if you are not careful.

(Mods used: B9 aerospace, FAR, cross feed enabler, Kine Tech animations, and module manager. All PART credit goes to the mod developers and Squad.
